title: What US news source has the most objective, neutral and balanced reporting, without commentary? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: I would not trust a news source that had NO commentary. Likewise, I don’t trust people who say they have no opinion on some major issue or other. What? NO OPINION? That simply means you’re not feeling or not thinking. And I can’t be bothered by a newspaper that is so bland, so eager to please, that is has no opinion or commentary. So long as that commentary is on the opinion page, where it belongs. That said, here are 10 sources you can trust, according to Forbes magazine. All have commentary: 10 Journalism Brands Where You Find Real Facts Rather Than Alternative Facts

The only non-partisan news source I’m aware of is PBS - because that network is funded only by public donations rather than partisan billionaire owners or multinational media conglomerates. But I don’t know of ANY news source that’s straight hard news, without commentary. The Associated Press will give you a nice balance of hard news, but even that site has commentary.
